task.title: First aid tips and tricks for solid furniture

context.p: In this section you will learn how to handle a few most common afflictions of solid wood. Some are of natural origin like woodworm and some are the outcome of our distraction like wine stains od scratches.
Master carpenter Stefan is a passionate wood connoisseur and, so to speak, the house carpenter of Meble kolonialne 24. If anyone knows how to handle solid wood furniture, it is Stefan.
